name: DUMBO Skate Spot
description: Cobblestone-adjacent flat areas under the Manhattan Bridge in DUMBO with various skateable architecture.
history: Organic street spot that grew as DUMBO developed. The waterfront area provides scenic sessions.
transitDirections: F to York St, A/C to High St.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include ledges, flat ground, banks, curbs. Urban architecture repurposed for skating.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Brooklyn skate scene in DUMBO. Organic street spot that grew as DUMBO developed. The waterfront area provides scenic sessions.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: F to York St, A/C to High St.. Weekday mornings before tourists arrive.
detailedNotes.warnings: Street spot â€” be respectful of the space and watch for security.
